featured.text: It replays the image back through the glasses after processing it on an attached computer.
Sometimes a tune intrudes on our thoughts and then plays, and replays, in a never-ending loop.

definition.zh_def: 重播；再次播放或回覆某事。
definition.en_def: To play back or respond to something again.
definition.example: I will replay the video so you can see it again.
